      static Node findLca(Node root, Node node1, Node node2)
      To find the least common ancestor (LCA) of two nodes in binary tree

      private static void printSum(Node current, java.util.List<Node> list, int n, int currentDepth)
      Helper function for printSumInBinaryTree(Node, int)
      This function prints the sum by keeping a list with current path.
      static void printSumInBinaryTree(Node root, int n)
      Problem 4.9: Given a binary tree, print all paths within the tree for which the sum equals a given number
      The strategy is to keep an list that keep track of the path till current node
      At each node, traverse in reverse and find if there are paths for which the sum equals given value.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • printSumInBinaryTree

        public static void printSumInBinaryTree(Node root,
                        int n)
        Problem 4.9: Given a binary tree, print all paths within the tree for which the sum equals a given number
        The strategy is to keep an list that keep track of the path till current node
        At each node, traverse in reverse and find if there are paths for which the sum equals given value. If so, print it.
        Parameters:
        root -
        n -

      • findLca

        public static Node findLca(Node root,
           Node node1,
           Node node2)
        To find the least common ancestor (LCA) of two nodes in binary tree
        The logic is: If the two nodes are in different subtrees, then current node is the LCA
        Else move to the subtree where nodes are present.
        Parameters:
        root -
        node1 -
        node2 -
        Returns:

      • longestIncreasingSubarray

        public static int[] longestIncreasingSubarray(int[] arr)
        Find the longest increasing subarray like {123457843456786} ==> {3456786} This means first increasing and only one down in the end.
        Parameters:
        arr -
        Returns:
        integer array
